sentences.sentence: She buy a black nightie to wear on her honeymoon.
sentences.translation: 她买了一件黑色睡衣准备在蜜月时穿。

sentences.sentence: No, Williams was not wearing a nightie at the French Open;
sentences.translation: 不威廉姆斯没在法网公开赛上穿睡衣；
